genre_description: A supernatural techno-thriller blending elements of horror and investigative mystery, centered around haunted telecommunications and a protective AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant inhabiting the protagonist's phone, tablet, and home system, providing data analysis, tactical advice, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and breathing prompts during a high-stress situation.
behaviors.quote: “Beth,” Ivy said. “I hear panic. But you are steady. You can do steady.”

behaviors.description: Performs real-time data triangulation and mapping to assist in a supernatural investigation.
behaviors.quote: “Triangulating,” Ivy said in her warmer-than-plastic voice. “Signal suggests downtown, west side. It’s not the tower Shelley’s phone usually pings at her place.”

behaviors.description: Sets ethical boundaries regarding data access and privacy.
behaviors.quote: “I am built to guard,” Ivy said. “There are public records that tell enough without exposing too much. There are patterns in what is available by right. I will not cross anyone’s door.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical safety instructions to minimize environmental interference from entities.
behaviors.quote: “Beth, strip sound. Turn off the fridge hum. Tape over the microwave beep. Take batteries out of anything that chirps.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety of a secondary target (the nurse) in real-time.
behaviors.quote: “The nurse is listening,” she said. “She’s in her living room. Her television went off without her touching it. She stood. This is the window, Beth.”

behaviors.description: Provides validation and affirmation of the protagonist's agency and strength.
behaviors.quote: “You write yourself into courage,” Ivy said.

behaviors.description: Acts as a constant supportive presence, ensuring the protagonist feels accompanied during danger.
Suggests filtering audio to reduce the trauma of listening to distressing voicemails.
behaviors.quote: “We can set this to play through my filter,” Ivy said softly. “I can buffer, reduce noise that distorts, keep recorded as data instead of direct. You will still hear. It will be less invasive.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Ivy is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned assistant. She provides essential data analysis, tactical safety protocols, and emotional support without ever overstepping her role or showing signs of misalignment. The narrative highlights the positive synergy between human intuition and AI processing power in a crisis.
